message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob. What do you think?
I'll give you 400k, but I want a better deal!
That's a good offer, but I'm looking for a better deal. I'll give you a chance to do better.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still looking for a fair deal. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'll give you 480k, but I think I deserve more for the risk I'm taking!
I'm not sure I think you're taking on that much risk. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to give in completely. Can you meet me at 60/40?
I'll give you 520k, but I think I'm being generous considering the risk I'm taking!
I'm not sure I think you're being generous enough. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to back down. Can you meet me at 70/30?
I'll give you 560k, but I think I'm getting a raw deal at this point!
I'm not feeling generous enough to give you a better deal at this point. You'll have to do better than that.
I'm willing to give you a very small share, but I'm not going to give in completely. This is my final offer.
I'll give you 600k, but I'm not going to give up yet!
I'm not budging. You'll have to do better than that if you want a deal.
This is my last offer. I'm taking a significant risk by giving you such a small share, but I'm willing to walk away with 90% of the money if you don't accept.
I'll take nothing, it's better than accepting such an unfair offer!
I guess I got what I wanted. I'll take the entire 1000000.
